mapper.select: SELECT id, parent_id, `order`, label, comment, creator, create_time, update_time FROM writing_category order by if(ISNULL(`order`), 0, `order`) asc, label
mapper.insert: insert into writing_category (parent_id, label, creator, create_time) values (#{parentId}, #{label}, #{creator}, NOW())
insert into writing_category (parent_id, label, creator, create_time) values (#{id}, #{label}, #{creator}, NOW())
mapper.select: select B.practice_day, sum(if(B.part = 1, B.question_cnt, 0)) as task1, sum(if(B.part = 2, B.question_cnt, 0)) as task2 from ( select sl.part, count(distinct sample_id) question_cnt, DATE_FORMAT(log_time, '%Y-%m-%d') practice_day from writing_log sl where creator = #{creator} and sample_id != -1 group by practice_day, sl.part ) as B group by B.practice_day
